column4: hi, does someone have experience with emulating sound inputs/outputs in integrated soundcard (Realtek ALC888) in MB Gigabyte GA-P43-ES3G, it uses Line In / Front Speaker Out / Mic In   for that 3 outputs for 5.1, so i hear only front speakers right now :)
you have some actual 5.1 sound source?
that soundcard is 5.1/7.1, inputs/outputs are configured in hardware, but it is switched by that Realtek software
drag icon to desktop check its properties to learn the commsnd  is what i do often
